remarks: The restriction of the category of division rings to the set of field homomorphisms is a category, the "category of fields".  (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
drhmsubcOLD.c $e |- C = ( U i^i DivRing ) $.
drhmsubcOLD.j $e |- J = ( r e. C , s e. C |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) $.
fldhmsubcOLD.d $e |- D = ( U i^i Field ) $.
fldhmsubcOLD.f $e |- F = ( r e. D , s e. D |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) $.
fldcOLD $p |- ( U e. V -> ( ( ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |`cat J ) |`cat F ) e. Cat ) $.
$d C r s $.
$d D r s $.
$d U r s $.
$d V r s $.
